string-array.name: frases_motivacionais
string-array.item: Persistence is the path to success.
Believe in yourself and you will be able to achieve anything.

Success is born from desire, determination, and persistence in reaching a goal. Even if you don’t hit the target, those who try and overcome obstacles will, at the very least, accomplish admirable things.
Failure is only an opportunity to start again with more intelligence.
All your ideas can work out if you have the right attitude to turn them into reality.
Optimism is faith in action. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Define your priorities and focus your efforts on what really matters.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and achievements.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day after day.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If life were predictable, it would cease to be life and be without flavor.
Life is too important to be taken seriously.
Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
Spread love wherever you go.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it.
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I’m possible!"
Keep your face toward the sun and you will not see the shadows.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched – they must be felt with the heart.
Believe you can and you’re already halfway there.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Success does not consist in never making mistakes, but in never making the same one twice.
Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life’s coming attractions.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
The only limit to our realizations of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Fight with determination, embrace life with passion, lose with class, and win with boldness, because the world belongs to those who dare, and life is too much to be insignificant.
Life is too short to be small.
The best revenge is massive success.
Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
The only thing standing between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is truly possible.
Success has nothing to do with how much money you make, but with the difference you make in people’s lives.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
Life is too short to waste it living someone else’s dreams.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Success is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
